sentences.en: Each swipe of a Pariah's Warscythe slows the target's movement speed and lowers maximum health.
sentences.cn: 贱民的Warscythe的每个强打减慢目标的运动速度并且减低最大的健康.

sentences.en: First, simply, it was a matter of face, of reducing its pariah-state image —a tangible symbol of being welcomed back into the global community.
sentences.cn: 首先，简单地说，这是面子问题，可以弱化它的贱民国家形象——一个欢迎它回归国际社会的切实象征。

sentences.en: He had been known as the ruthless leader of a pariah state, a butcher, a delusional man divorced from reality.
sentences.cn: 他就是被人称为一个贱民国度的残忍领导人，一个屠夫，一个脱离实际只会妄想的男子汉。

sentences.en: His removal by force, however, has made Honduras a pariah among regional nations.
sentences.cn: 然而他被武力推翻的事实导致洪都拉斯在该地区各国中地位低下.

sentences.en: It took her four days to realize that she was the pariah of the legal profession.
sentences.cn: 四天之后,她才意识到自己已被法律界所摈弃.

sentences.en: Shortly Tom came upon the juvenile pariah of the village.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿,汤姆碰上了村里的少年弃儿.

sentences.en: The emancipation process of pariah began in the period of colony.
sentences.cn: 贱民解放的过程起始于殖民地时期.
